resources.string: You will be taking a math test that consists of 10 multiple-choice questions covering various math topics. You will need to read each question carefully and select the correct answer from a list provided on your device screen.

This is a program that allows your children to take a math test consisting of 10 questions. The program will present one question at a time and your child will be able to select their answer from a set of choices. After answering all 10 questions, the program will calculate and display the child\'s score. The test is designed to help your children practice and improve their math skills.
